channel.title: Diego W. Antunes
channel.description: Recent content on Diego W. Antunes

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a computer engineer and I’ve been playing with computers for a long time. I love creating things, software most of the time but I have also created hardware a few years ago. Thanks for reading!

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can find me at @diegowa on twitter. Email devlware or diego.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Short Intro I’m a software engineer. Experience DevOps Engineer - Send4/Troquefacil; Curitiba — 07/2019-Present I manage a small group of 6 devs (back & frontends), I run 1x1 with team and I’m also responsible to hire new people. I created and improved our build and deployment pipelines to have faster products releases. Reduced by 40% frontend API calls by deploying New Relic and monitoring http requests. I am responsible to build and maintain our cloud infrastructure inside GCP, manage Kubernetes clusters, deploy new services and products.
